bibl.bibl: Carpenter, William Benjamin. 1868. Preliminary report of dredging operations in the seas to the north of the British Islands, carried on in Her Majesty’s steam-vessel ‘Lightning’, by Dr. Carpenter and Dr. Wyville Thomson, Professor of Natural History in Queen's College, Belfast. [Read 17 December 1868.] Proceedings of the Royal Society of London 17 (1868–9): 168–200.
